item.title: Lessons learned after migrating Azure Functions to Isolated Functions on .NET 8
item.description: The In-process model of running Azure Functions is being retired in favor of the Isolated model in two years. A lot of components on elmah.io are running on Azure Functions. To ensure we are running on the most modern and supported platform (also in two years), we have spent asd Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/lessons-learned-after-migrating-azure-functions-to-isolated-functions-on-net-8/
